comments.author: Luis

comments.content: We criticize Wilder for fighting Ortiz due to his resume, rightly so, but is ruiz's resume better than Ortiz's? Joshua was flopping all over the ring against a guy that has proven less than Ortiz, nobody says this. Up until the AJ fight, Ruiz's most notable fight was losing a close decision to Parke
